[[Image:Middle-earth Calendar 1998 (Finn: '''Middle-earth Calendar 1998''' was produced by the [[Finnish Tolkien Society]] and includes pen and ink illustrations by [[Sari Luoto-Tudeer]], [[Rudi Airisto]], [[Sami Vähä-Aho]], [[Päivi Tienari]], and [[Lovissa Mustonen]]. The calendar also includes brief notes on the illustrators and information about the society.
